text: tavada “oba sæma margayakama vadi vi sitimin allah mata visvasaya tæbuvanva biya ganva ohuge margayehi ovun yama badha kara, ehi ædayak æti nokaranu. ita sulutarayaka janatavak vasayen siti obava adhika gananayak bavata pat kirima gænada sita (allahta stuti karamin) sitinu. (bhumiyehi) aparadha karamin ævida sitiyavunge avasanaya kese vuvedæyi yannada obaavadhanaya kara balanu mænava!”
